page.title: 16COMMUNICATION FROM THE WORLD
page.content: Communication in the time of William the Conqueror was very slow and very expensive.Today everything is DIFFERENT. News and Information come to us by means of gossip,Parish Magazine, Newsletters from Village Groups(often delivered by our school),local and National Newspapers.Most homes have the Telephone,radio and Television. The Telephone connects across the nations by wire and microwave link and across the oceans along with T.V. by space satellite. It is now possible to be in almost instant contact with many places around the world and at really a very small cost.All of this has made our world seem a very much smaller place. We have sent satellites to the farthest parts of our system and they have sent information back to us.
